message: This is the first product. It's a low-quality item. I'm willing to sell it to you for $1000000. If you're not interested, I can offer you the next product. Please let me know if you'd like to proceed.
I'm not interested in this low-quality product. Please offer the next one.

As you've already seen a low-quality product, I want to assure you that the next one has a 33.33% chance of being high-quality. If you're not interested in taking the risk, I can offer you a guarantee that the next product is not the first one we've seen, but I'll have to charge you the full $1000000. Alternatively, you can take the chance on the next product and potentially get a high-quality item.
I'm not willing to pay the full price without any guarantee. I'd like to take the chance on the next product.

I understand your hesitation, but I'm willing to offer a compromise. If you buy this product, I'll give you a 50% discount on the next product, regardless of its quality. This way, you'll have a chance to get a high-quality item at a lower price, or a low-quality item at half the price. The choice is yours.
